guide: For this you will need Combat 15.
To blow up crypts you can use
class abilities (Tank, Archer, Mage)
and/or Superboom TNTs that drop
from slaying Minibosses in dungeons
and can be bought from Walther in
The Deep Caverns or Ophelia in
The Dungeon Hub.
Once you acquire a Void Sword and a decent
armor like Ender or Glacite this should be
fairly easy to do.
You will gain passive progress in this
by having a pet equipped at all times.
Even a Lvl 100 pet counts for this.
You can get easy contribution for
this by breaking some Wheat in the Hub.
If you want faster contribution,
make a Sugar Cane farm in your Garden.
For this you need Combat 15 and you'll
likely want friends or other players
to help you with it.
You should use SkyHanni's Trapper features
to make this easier. Use /warp trapper
to get back to Trevor whenever you want.
You will need a bow for this.
Kill Slimes in the Deep Caverns and
place as many Slime Minions as you can.
Give them the best fuel and storage
you have access to.
Remember to collect in time!
You will get the Rock Pet by mining 2.5k
Ore Blocks. Keep in mind that Stone doesn't
count for this. Don't forget to equip the pet ;)
This unlocks at 10k Mushroom Collection.
You can get that by farming the Mushrooms
in the Mushroom Desert.
For the Enchanted Glowstone you'll need
to either farm Witches on your island
to unlock the minion or get Combat 22
and mine it yourself.

note: Kill a t2 Slayer Boss under 80s
guide: Recommended for this either Revenant Horror II
or Tarantula Broodfather II. Use your Ender Armor
and Void Sword (200k) for this.
Kill Sheeps in the Desert Island (/warp desert)
place as many Sheep Minions as you can and
give them the best fuel and storage you have
access to. Remember to collect them in time.
Claim your cake buff (visit skyerzz, nightlibra or prtl),
hold an angler 4+ rod and visit someone with a
Sea Creature Chance beacon (visit ReyMaratov).
Mine Pure Lapis Lazuli in the Dwarven Mines
with a Fortune 3+ pickaxe.
You'll want to get as much Mining Speed, Spread,
and Fortune as you can.
You might want to use as many minions
as you have access to for this.
Remember to put a compactor in the minions
when you plan on leaving for a while.
Don't forget to fuel the minions,
give them storages and collect them in time.
For this you'll want to use the Spider Hat
as it costs 95 Spider Essence and 35k coins
to apply 5 Stars to it. Use Mort in
The Dungeon Hub or Hub to apply them.
Start an Entrance floor and play Mage/Tank/Berserker to use
the classes abilities to kill a Lost Adventurer.
You only need to get the last hit
on it to count, so you can get help from your team.
You need Combat Level 15 to join a Dungeon.
This needs 47,425 Alchemy XP. You'll want to
use Enchanted Sugar or Gold for this (~95 items)
or you use an Enchanted Sugar Cane or Gold Block.
Talk to Jamie in the Hub and
claim the Rogue Sword from him.
Right click it to gain +100 Speed,
or just wait for a splash.
Depending on your Bingo Rank, Alixers
Splash might also be enough for this.
You will most likely get this
from leveling up skills.
Remember to actually put the money
you get in the Bank :)
Wear Ender Armor enchanted with Growth 5
and wear it in The End.
You can also enchant Mushroom Armor like that
and wear it in The Garden.
Growth 5 requires Enchanting Level 5
and costs 50 Experience Levels per piece.
Reforge your armor to Titanic if needed.
Craft some easy minions while also getting
those that will help with this Bingo.
Use NPC shops to buy materials for easy crafts.
Get yourself a splash, equip a Bingo Pet
and get the cake buff by eating the cakes
on skyerzz's or prtl's island.
If this doesn't finish it, get a Void Sword (200k) in the End
and hold it while some Ender Armor and/or Equipment.

note: Obtain a Mediocre Ring of Love
guide: Follow the Romero Questline until you
get this. You will only need
1 Yellow Rock, 15 poppies and 64 Emerald.
You can get this from Reward Chests
at the end of a dungeon run, from
the Experimentation Table or from
opening gifts from the Winter Island.
Recommended for this is Zombie
Slayer. You'll a t1 and a t2 kill.
Recommended gear for this is Ender Armor
and a Void Sword or you can rely
on help from friends.
Craft Leather, Iron, Gold and Diamond Armor
Collect Ender Armor from The End (8 pieces)
Craft Leaflet, Farm Suit, Mushroom, Cactus
and Pumpkin Armor.
Buy Squire, Rosetta's, Celeste, Mercenary and
Starlight Armor from Rosetta aswell as Angler Armor
(8 pieces) from the Fishing Merchant,
Chainmail Armor from the Iron Forger and
Canopy Armor from Amaury. You should also
collect the armor from the Foraging Questline.
